Jay - backing down to 1.5 may have "resolved" the problem but at the heavy cost
of being unable to correctly detect status.  Something in the status-detection
change has caused the failure.  I am working on finding the cause of this thing.

Can you please tell me als the version of Star Team and the version of Java that
you are using?

Steve, just fyi Jay and Alvin (the other defect voter) work on the same team as 
myself.  Jay is trying to use my ant scripts :-)  I had him open the defect.  I 
can't reproduce the issue on my issue but he and Alvin both have the problem.
